dk.pervasive.jcaf
Interface SecureContextService

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
SecureContextServiceImpl
public interface SecureContextService
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface represents a secure context service. A secure context service is able to add secure context items to an Entity context.

Author:
Jakob Bardram
